sys_ux_data_broker_transform.name: Request Detail internationalization support
sys_ux_data_broker_transform.script:
function transform(input) { var titles = { "need_attention" : gs.getMessage("Needs Attention"), "request_approvals_this_year" : gs.getMessage("Request Approvals This Year"), "request_by_category_this_quarter" : gs.getMessage("Approvals By Category This Quarter"), "new_request_approvals" : gs.getMessage("New Request Approvals"), "recently_approved_request" : gs.getMessage("Recently Approved requests"), "active_approvals" : gs.getMessage("Active Approvals"), "approvals_completed" : gs.getMessage("Approvals Completed"), "request_status" : gs.getMessage("Request Status"), "request_approval_categories" : gs.getMessage("Request Approval Categories"), "request_approval_title" : gs.getMessage("Request Approval"), "welcome" : gs.getMessage("Welcome"), "request_approval_subtext" : gs.getMessage("Keep track of your request approvals with automated workflows."), "request_approval_login" : gs.getMessage("Log in to continue"), "request_approval_landing_subtext" : gs.getMessage("Submit requests for approval and manage previous submissions"), "request_approval_form_title" : gs.getMessage("Submit Request"), "func_approval_form_title" : gs.getMessage("Submit a functional detail"), "request_approval_form_number" : gs.getMessage("Request Number"), "request_approval_form_status" : gs.getMessage("Request Status"), "request_approval_form_description" : gs.getMessage("Briefly describe the request requiring approval (optional, max 4000 characters)"), "reference_number" : gs.getMessage("Reference no: "), "your_all_request_title" : gs.getMessage("Your All Request"), "your_sendback_request_title" : gs.getMessage("Sendback Request"), "home" : gs.getMessage("Home"), "all_request_title" : gs.getMessage("All Request"), "all_sendback_request_title" : gs.getMessage("All Returned request"), "request_view_number" : gs.getMessage("Number"), "request_view_description" : gs.getMessage("Description"), "request_view_status" : gs.getMessage("Status"), "request_view_created" : gs.getMessage("Created"), "404_message" : gs.getMessage("This page you were trying to reach doesn't seem to exist.
Lets get you back on the track.") }; return titles; }
